official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer certain funds to enable the Secretary to take immediate action to eradicate and control avian influenza and citrus canker, and for other purposes.
short_title: Emergency Avian Influenza and Citrus Canker Response Act of 1986

summary.text: Emergency Avian Influenza and Citrus Canker Response Act of 1986 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer specified Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) funds to control outbreaks of avian influenza or citrus canker. Authorizes appropriations to the CCC in the amount of any such transfers.

titles.title: Emergency Avian Influenza and Citrus Canker Response Act of 1986

A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer certain funds to enable the Secretary to take immediate action to eradicate and control avian influenza and citrus canker, and for other purposes.
